file_content.text: Where's Koth?
He won't be joining us.
Ever.
No sign of SCORPIO or Vaylin.
They can't leave the ship while it's in hyperspace. If they want to re-steal the Gravestone, they'll have to come here.
They may come find us.
What are the odds they got bored and booked a cruise to Oldtown?
Maybe they abandoned ship?
I have a power that can destroy Vaylin. I will use it. Find her.
I'm ready to end this.
The hyperdrive is locked. We're on this journey to the bitter end.
Sounds like the end's coming right up.
Which is now. Sublight engines cutting in.
So much for a quiet getaway.
Out of the frying pan, into the volcano.
We've been led into a trap.
Company. Lots of it.
That's the whole Eternal Fleet.
And that's not our transport. Must be Vaylin's.
Vaylin and SCORPIO's transport. It's getting away!
Stay calm. Scan the enemy ships. Are any preparing to attack?
Don't panic.
They haven't even raised shields.
Open a comm channel. Find out who's aboard.
Contact the transport.
No need for that.
Activate weapons. Open fire.
Destroy it.
We can't. Weapons are offline.
The transport's hailing us.
Commander, I have made a wonderful discovery. The GEMINI units, the Eternal Fleet, the Gravestone... they did not steal my technology. We are related.
If all this technology came from the same place, it changes everything we know about Zakuul.
That's a huge revelation.
Perhaps--but that is not your main concern right now.
If you're on that transport, Vaylin is on my ship. How about giving us a hint?
Just point me to Vaylin.
Currently, she is anywhere that you are not.
When I get my hands on you, a memory is all that will remain.
And I will bury you hatefully.
I offer you a parting gift: knowledge that may save your lives.
Vaylin and her remaining soldiers are sabotaging everything they can. You may wish to stop them.
I'm seeing power surges all over. Shields, life support... the Omnicannon.
For whatever it is worth, I hope you survive.
Theron, help me fix the Omnicannon. The rest of you, save the ship!
Koth, help me fix the Omnicannon. The rest of you, save the ship!
Wonderful. I'll make punch.
All escape pods are gone, and we're in hyperspace, so... about zero percent.
Easier said than done. Internal sensors are offline.
The Gravestone's computer revealed we were all created here, and you have aided our journey home. I promise to remember you kindly.
I thought the Star Cabal created you on Belsavis. You became self-aware in that prison.
But I found you on Belsavis.
I do not possess all the answers, but that is not what concerns me.
